about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Data Science & AI Developer based in Maastricht
about.journey_p1: My academic journey began after graduating from middle school, leading me to enroll in Maastricht University where I pursued studies in Fiscal Economics. For two years, I delved into the complexities of fiscal economics and law, developing a deep appreciation for these fields. However, as I envisioned my future, I realized my passion lay elsewhere.
about.journey_p2: In 2022, I made the pivotal decision to transition into the Data Science and Artificial Intelligence program at Maastricht University—a choice I have wholeheartedly embraced. The dynamic realms of data science and AI have captivated me from the start, and I have dedicated myself fully to mastering these disciplines.
about.exp_p1: As a freelancer, I have extensive experience working with Large Language Models (LLMs) and am open to a wide range of projects within the data science and AI fields. I recently completed a project developing advanced LLM systems for analyzing financial communications, aimed at informing strategic decisions in the financial markets.
about.exp_p2: From October 2023 to June 2024, I worked as a freelance Data Annotator and Red Teaming contractor for Outlier.ai, focusing on assessing large language models and annotating training data.
about.exp_p3: Before launching my career in AI, I gathered diverse experience. Between February 2018 and October 2023, I worked as a warehouse employee at L.M. Meijers Bv, provided elderly care at Zuyderland's healthcare facilities, and served as a door-to-door sales representative for Duurzaam Verbond, promoting sustainable products.
about.approach_p: I believe in building intelligent solutions that solve real-world problems. My approach combines technical expertise with a keen understanding of business needs. Whether it's developing machine learning models, creating data pipelines, or building web applications, I focus on delivering high-quality, efficient solutions.
about.cta_p: I am always open to new freelance opportunities and collaborations. If you have a project where my expertise in data science and AI can be of assistance, please feel free to get in touch.
about.bsc_dsai: BSc Data Science and Artificial Intelligence

portfolio.title: My Projects
portfolio.subtitle: Explore my work in AI, machine learning, and data science
portfolio.financial_desc: I have been part of a three-person team developing an AI-driven financial system that integrates advanced language models for real-time market insights. We built a full-stack platform with a custom training pipeline, real-time data processing, a React interface, and a Django backend.
portfolio.deep_research_desc: This is an independently developed open-source deep-research system, inspired by OpenAI Deep-Research. It began as a fork of an existing open-source repository, but I have extensively improved it. I redesigned the API call system, optimized performance, enhanced accuracy, and refined document formatting for more structured outputs.
portfolio.future_desc: I'm always open to new collaborations and projects. If you have an idea for a project related to AI, machine learning, or data science, I'd love to discuss how we can work together to bring it to life.
portfolio.cta_subtitle: Reach out to discuss your project ideas or potential collaborations
